repairedDockerfile:
FROM rustlang/rust:nightly

RUN rustup component add clippy-preview --toolchain=nightly

RUN set -ex; \
    apt-get update; \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    build-essential \
    cmake \
    uuid-dev \
    curl \
    libcurl4-openssl-dev \
    ; \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

WORKDIR /volume

CMD cargo +nightly clippy --all
